name: Chroma (itch) (Walrusboy99)
description:
Chroma is a game all about speed! Use the WASD or Arrow Keys to shift your orb's color so you can match your turret to the color of incoming bullets. Miss three of them, and you'll have to try again!

Test your color and reflex skills in three different modes:

  • RGB: Red, Green, and Blue
  • CMYK: Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, and Black
  • Ultimate: White, Red, Yellow, Green, Blue, Orange, Lime Green, Teal, and Purple

Credits
Created with GameMaker:Studio 1.4
Sounds made with Chiptone
